title: WeWow Day 3: Let's Meet Explorer, Matthew Henson
description:
Mindy and Guy Raz are back on the road in the Wowmobile! Today, they're learning about Matthew Henson, a Black explorer who co-discovered the North Pole, while listening to one of their favorite podcasts, "Who, When, Wow!" Stay tuned to hear more of Matthew's adventures tomorrow.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
